info.title: Service Engine X API
info.description: Service Engine X REST API - Multi-tenant SaaS platform for service businesses

get.description:
Health check endpoint.

Returns the API status, version, and current timestamp.

List all clients for the authenticated organization.

Supports pagination, sorting, and filtering.

schema.title: Response List Clients Api Clients Get

get.description: Retrieve a single client by ID.

delete.description: Delete a client (hard delete with FK guard).

get.description:
List all services for the authenticated organization.

Supports pagination, sorting, and filtering.

schema.title: Response List Services Api Services Get

get.description: Retrieve a single service by ID.
List all orders for the authenticated organization.

schema.title: Response List Orders Api Orders Get

get.description: Retrieve a single order by ID.
List all tasks for an order.

schema.title: Response List Order Tasks Api Orders  Order Id  Tasks Get

post.description: Create a task for an order.

get.description: List all messages for an order.

schema.title: Response List Order Messages Api Orders  Order Id  Messages Get

post.description: Create a message for an order.

get.description: List proposals with pagination.
Retrieve a proposal by ID.

post.description:
Sign a proposal (Sent -> Signed).

Creates:
- An engagement (work relationship container)
- Projects for each proposal item
- An order (financial transaction record)

schema.title: Response Sign Proposal Api Proposals  Proposal Id  Sign Post

get.description: List invoices with pagination.
Retrieve an invoice by ID.

post.description: Charge an invoice via payment processor.
Mark an invoice as manually paid.

get.description: List tickets with pagination.
Retrieve a ticket by ID.
List all engagements for the authenticated organization.

schema.title: Response List Engagements Api Engagements Get

get.description: Retrieve an engagement with its projects and conversations.

delete.description:
Close an engagement (sets status to Closed).

Engagements are not hard-deleted to preserve history.
Use this to close an engagement relationship.

get.description: List all projects for the authenticated organization.

schema.title: Response List Projects Api Projects Get

post.description: Create a new project within an engagement.

get.description: Retrieve a project with its engagement and service info.

post.description: Advance a project to the next phase.

get.description: List all conversations for a project.

schema.title: Response List Conversations Api Projects  Project Id  Conversations Get

post.description: Create a new conversation within a project.

get.description: Retrieve a conversation with its messages.

delete.description:
Close a conversation (sets status to Closed).

Conversations are not deleted to preserve history.

get.description: List messages in a conversation.

schema.title: Response List Messages Api Projects  Project Id  Conversations  Conversation Id  Messages Get

post.description: Create a new message in a conversation.

get.description: API index endpoint listing available resources.
